name: Z Dawn
description: The Z infection was spread, the world everyone know ceased to exist. Lead a group of survivors throughout a zombie apocalypse in an astounding strategic challenge to try to make the best possible decisions.Survive, loot, explore, build, defend, attack!
minimum_requirements: OS: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2 GHz (32/64bits) Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Minimum Resolution - 1336x768, Graphics Card with at least 128MB Dedicated Memory Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Works on 32 and 64 bits systems
